reviews.review:
The game is fun in the ways it's intended until you and your opponents are remotely good at it

this game is flimsy and and at it's core very 1-dimensional
This is csgo:
- awareness of counterstrafing
- memorizing spray control
- memorizing grenade placement
- peeking deliberately
- listening to noise
- reaction time
It is a primarily gamesense game, but feels mechanically and functionally flimsy
Muchos BR mala leche y chiteros pero me encanta
Одни читеры! Вообще желания нет играть в это говно......
una verga, te banean por cualquier cosa. estafan gente.
Molestia con tener que cerrar sesion por culpa del VAC
CS to syf z community gorszym niż minecraft, a valve ssie pałe
ГОВНО ИГРА НЕ СОВЕТУЮ, ТУПАЯ ТРАТА НЕРВ

Valve refuses to lifetime ban accounts and charge for accounts.  Want the game to work?  Ban cheaters - keep all of their skins.  Distribute their skins amongst all the players they cheated out of a fun experience.  Write a cheat-detection that takes screenshots.  Work with the graphics companies to lock in with their drivers.  Collection a million screenshots of cheaters and have a mega ban-day when no one expects it.  This game used ot be so much fun.  Now every online match is against cheaters.  Until they fix this broken game, it is not worth playing.

Данная игра вполне комфортабельная для предварительных ласк. Всего за несколько часов вы можете ощутить легкое блаженство в своем внутреннем мире и в полном спокойствии пойти и удалить эту игру. Данную игру можно рекомендовать другим спокойно, ведь предварительными ласками нужно делится с другими.
valve da ban injustamente, nao recomendo o jogo, perde dinheiro
se você ama sua família, amigos e gosta de vida social nem joga
shit fps after update, had 300 now 100
bu oyun benim için çok garip oldu canım girmek istiyor fakat oyuna girince de bir kaç round sonra sıkılıyorum

Worst game i will probably ever play in my life  after 1600 hours dodging the low trust factor, the toxic teamates as well as community and all the griefers and cheaters who apparently don't get punished.The funny part is that after 1600 playing this game in a 3 years old account i got vac banned without ever cheating on any game as i despise cheating and specially i wouldn't do it on a 3 years old account with skins, after all of this wholesome bans for no reason the funny part is you enter a game and see a guy with spin bot who doesn't get banned playing in a whole 45 minutes game.
Excluindo os cheaters descarados e excessivos, um jogo atemporal, muito divertido e prazeroso.
Odkąd Cs Go jest darmowy... nie da się grać na non prime :(
Good Game love it so much all best from me :D
I am still trying to find the difference between this game and being a real life American hero soldier

мне больше нечего сказать, всё
I got depressed by this game will highly recommend
oyununuzda takip edilemeyecek kadar hile bulunmakta

mt bom o jogo 
divertido de jogar
o jogo e bom de mais

no pienso volver a jugar a este, por varios motivos:
-pagar por cajas que ni siquiera te dan la skin que a ti te gusta me parece una forma tan sucia de hacer dinero que me da asco
-te vanean nose cuantas horas por no poder entrar a la jodida partida, que me estas contando, si fuera competi lo entiendo, pero si solo e tardado 1 puto segundo mas de lo que el juego dice, que culpa tengo yo
-una comunidad de mierda 
-consejos horribles
-bugs que parece que no pero se notan como los disparos, las hitbox no va bien
-un rankin asqueroso
en resumen unjuego de mierda y llevo 1224 h perdidas de mi vida claro esta
its really good you should give it a try!!!
